Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security"> *[EventData[Data[@Name="TargetUserName"] and (Data="Administrators")]] and *[System[(EventID="4732") or (EventID="4733")]] </Select> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID="4720") or (EventID="4726")]]</Select> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID="1102")]]</Select> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID="7045")]]</Select> </Query> <Query Id="1" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing'] and (Level=4 or Level=0) and EventID=4740]]</Select> <Suppress Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4799)]]</Suppress> </Query> <Query Id="2" Path="MaliciousIPs"> <Select Path="MaliciousIPs">*[System[(EventID=1) or (EventID=2)]]</Select> </Query> <Query Id="3" Path="Hash Validations"> <Select Path="Hash Validations">*[System[(EventID=4444)]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
